trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event when a button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> row field is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>evento quando un pulsante all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>si fa clic sul campo di riga.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo è possibile fornire un gestore eventi che esegue una routine personalizzata ogni volta che si verifica questo evento.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update").
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo genera anche altri eventi specifici quando si fa clic alcuni pulsanti (pulsanti con la `CommandName` proprietà è impostata su "Delete", "Insert", "Pagina" o "Update").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza uno di questi pulsanti, è consigliabile utilizzare uno degli eventi specifici forniti dal controllo (ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto DetailsViewCommandEventArgs viene passato al gestore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: If the button that raised the event has a command name or command argument value, you can use the DetailsViewCommandEventArgs object to determine these values.
trans-unit.target: Se il pulsante che ha generato l'evento ha un nome di comando o il valore dell'argomento di comando, è possibile utilizzare l'oggetto DetailsViewCommandEventArgs per determinare questi valori.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il nome e l'argomento del comando del pulsante scelto, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo che ha generato l'evento tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewCommandEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza della classe DetailsViewCommandEventArgs, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| Il valore della proprietà <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contenuto nel `originalArgs` parametro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| Il valore della proprietà dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>contenuta <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>il `originalArgs` parametro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Oggetto contenuto nel `commandSource` parametro. | > [!NOTE] > Questo costruttore viene utilizzato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli per la generazione di eventi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: L'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà CommandSource per accedere alle proprietà dell'oggetto che rappresenta l'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control itself, and in other cases it will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, questo sarà il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo stesso e in altri casi sarà il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>controllo che è stato fatto clic.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> classe che rappresenta l'origine del comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo ha gestito l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: Impostare questa proprietà su `true` nel gestore eventi per specificare che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controllo non deve gestire l'evento perché vengono gestite nel codice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il codice evento associato a dati non è stato eseguito oppure ha completato l'esecuzione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
